data.what_is: Automatur is a marketing automation software application that goes far beyond a basic contact or relationship management system.
data.product_description: Automatur is a marketing automation software application that goes far beyond a basic contact or relationship management system.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Automatur?
Is that with Automatur anything manually can be converted and done automatically through the system

What do you dislike about Automatur?
Nothing as this will lead to reduce time consuming and make life easier

What problems is Automatur solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automatur marketing, Automate the process from doing it manually to be done automatically

initial_reviews.review_title: Love that Automatur runs on open source platforms exclusively
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Automatur?
The tools that automate the capturing of essential data at the  source

What do you dislike about Automatur?
It Can be a little confusing and complicated at times

What problems is Automatur solving and how is that benefiting you?
Saving time!!!
